XData.name: SubjectArea
XData.Data: <subjectArea xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee/subjectarea" name="Category Online" displayName="Category Data for Online Sales" disabled="false" baseCube="HoleFoodsTransactionCube"> <measure name="Amount Sold" disabled="false" hidden="true"></measure> </subjectArea>

Method.name: %OnGetFilterSpec
Method.Implementation: Set category=$Get(^MyCategory) Set pFilterSpec= "([Product].[H1].[Product Category].&[" _category_"],[CHANNEL NAME].[H1].[CHANNEL NAME].&[Online])" Quit pFilterSpec
